title: Ticket #1594: EC2 job ads missing instance label
description: Running EC2 jobs include a AmazonRemoteVirtualMachineName, which is the FQDN of the instance's public network interface. It should also include the AmazonRemoteInstanceName = "i-abc123" to assist in lookups with ec2 commands. The information happens to be included in the opaque GridJobId.
